Akron.Mayflower Manor Apartments: Mayflower Manor Apartments (previously known as the Sheraton Hotel) is a high-rise residential building located at 263 South Main Street in Downtown Akron, Ohio, United States. It has 16 floors (as well as one sub-level) and stands at a height of 207 feet, making it one of the tallest buildings in the city. Construction of the building began in 1930 and was completed in 1931. It was designed by the prolific architecture firm Graham, Anderson, Probst & White, and has many trademark features of the art-deco style of its day.
